data.title: A Long Year
authors: Contributors to Miracle of Sound Wiki
data.meta_description: A Long Year is the twelfth and final song on Miracle of Sound's thirteenth album, Level 11. It was released on Bandcamp on December 22, 2020 and on Youtube on December 31, 2020. data.text:
A Long Year is the twelfth and final song on Miracle of Sound's thirteenth album, Level 11. It was released on Bandcamp on December 22, 2020 and on Youtube on December 31, 2020.

Lyrics[]

It's been a long year

I know you're tired and you're blue

You've been breathing smoke inside this trial of fire

But you got through

And I know the world's gone wrong

But you're still present, you're still strong

Hold on

Through all your pain and all your tears

You're still resolute

And you're still here

It's been a long year

It's been so heavy on your soul

And though your scars have hardened and have turned to armor

It took its toll

And I know the world's gone wrong

But you're still present, you're still strong

Hold on

Through all your pain and all your tears

You're still resolute

And you're still here

It's been a long, long year

But you're still here

It's been a long, long year

Meaning[]

The song was inspired by the many difficulties surrounding the year 2020, calling on the listeners to keep hanging on. In the words of Gavin Dunne, “I dedicate it to all of you who struggled or lost someone or something this year. I hope it brings you a little comfort and I wish you all a peaceful & brighter 2021.”
